subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: Adam Scott, beating Ángel Cabrera in a playoff, exorcised the memories of Greg Norman’s collapse at the 1996 Masters and his own collapse at the 2012 British Open.
snippet: Adam Scott, beating Ángel Cabrera in a playoff, exorcised the memories of Greg Norman’s collapse at the 1996 Masters and his own collapse at the 2012 British Open.
